text: The Garnet Bracelet () is a 1964 Soviet drama movie directed by Abram Room.В Гатчине открывается российский кинофестиваль "Литература и кино"ГРАНАТОВЫЙ БРАСЛЕТ (1964) It stars Ariadna Shengelaia, Igor Ozerov, and Oleg Basilashvili. == Actors == * Ariadna Shengelaia as Vera Nikolayevna (as Ariadna Shengelaya) * Igor Ozerov as Zheltkov * Oleg Basilashvili as Vasily Lvovitch * Vladislav Strzhelchik as Nikolai Nikolayevich * Natalya Malyavina as Anna Nikolayevna (as N. Malyavina) * Yuri Averin as Von Friesse (as Yu. Averin) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1964 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Abram Room
title: The Garnet Bracelet (movie)
